Description of incident: Swiss Cleaners notified customers of a data breach to their credit card system that may have compromised customers debit/credit card information. The company investigated the incident and discovered malware on their system that handles their payment card system. The malware made copies of the payment card information as it was being routed from Swiss Cleaners system to the payment processor. The malware installed gathered cardholder names, card numbers, expiration dates and the verification code on the back of cards. The cards compromised were used at the location at 35 Windsor Avenue, PO Box 825, Vernon Connecticut from December 30, 2014 through October 26, 2015 as well as any other Swiss Cleaner stores from December 30, 2014 through October 23, 2015. The breach affected the company's drycleaning services only. For those affected with questions call 1-888-760-4869 Monday-Friday 9 am to 9 pm EST.More information: http://www.databreaches.net/ct-alerted-that-banks-had-discovered-a-probl...
